TopicTitle: having difficulty building vehicles with Modular Wheels! help

Articles.Content:
I downloaded a mod called modular multiwheels which is supposed to help you make trucks and vechicles, I tried making some in the last few hours but I don't know which parts compliments with each other and the wheels are hard to place manually for me, because the parts I put in doesn't have nodes, I have to place it one by one

Anyone here have a .craft file using modular wheels that you can share with me? So I can have a basis how trucks in the game are made?

I'm using the following structural packs, KSPX, Nova Punch, KWRocketry, Deep Space Pack, and B9 Aerospace.

For some reason, those wheels look enormous... Even on my heavy trucks.

There must be a specific way to put them on our vehicles.

There must be a specific way to put them on our vehicles.

Not really, they attach in exactly the same way as the stock rover wheels. The default orientation can be funny so you may need to rotate them first.

Example craft: https://skydrive.live.com/redir?resid=384BA28C8578E539!154&authkey=!ANFcRaiNF8Zf-nk

Not really, they attach in exactly the same way as the stock rover wheels. The default orientation can be funny so you may need to rotate them first.

Example craft: https://skydrive.live.com/redir?resid=384BA28C8578E539!154&authkey=!ANFcRaiNF8Zf-nk

Thanks how did you place them in perfect symmetry to each other? When I tried to edit them and place them on my own, one is upside down on the other side

i'd imagine starting off in the Space plane hanger SPH (it does mirroring instead of symmetry, what you need for wheels normally)

then moving the craft file to the Vehicle assembly building (VAB)

i'd imagine starting off in the space plane hanger sph (it does mirroring instead of symmetry, what you need for wheels normally)

then moving the craft file to the vehicle assembly building (vab)

yes!!! Thanks it worked!! Thanks man!!
